Text: shendrinsf For your dining pleasure mynsnewsstorytmpltablencatid JLW PS Always serve w a radish garnish

Reshendrinsf That I am my friend still smackin the goods to the companys elite Didnt ECT go out of bizness a few years back I moved over here last month after much soul searching and a little divine intervention I got out while the gettin was good and there was still something to get out of Remember there are no layoffs in the Champagne Room So now Im toiling away on the power desk Commodity Risk Management to be exact Currently I take the wholesale curves and massage them to capture more of the physical risk associated with the retail bizness cong losses ancillary etc A commercial role no doubt And last week I learned how to schedule power in Californiatake that to the cocktail party and stretch some honnies yessir i thought thed never give a brotha the busbar BTWeither you are really early for Easter Bunny decorations youve expanded on your rainbow welcome mat or you are seriuosly remiss about the Christmas decorations or worse a party I missed inviting myself to Whats up with that How is everything else going Hows Julie these days Did you ever get those peppers to grow God be willing Ill have some chilis serranos and habaneros to trade this summer Aye Poppeeee Anyway keep in touch with others that is JLW Jeffrey L Wilson Manager Commodity Risk Management Enron Energy Services mailto Scott CT PM To Jeffrey ES cc Subject Re Youre at EES now Youre like the journeyman What are you doing now Scott
